data.quote: A little Consideration, a little Thought for Others, makes all the difference.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: A tail isn’t a tail to them, it’s just a little bit extra at the back.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: After all, what are birthdays? Here today and gone tomorrow.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Days. Weeks. Months. Who knows?
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Don’t blame me if it rains.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Don’t Bustle me. Don’t now-then me.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: If it is a good morning, which I doubt.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: I’m telling you. People come and go in this Forest, and they say, ‘It’s only Eeyore, so it doesn’t count.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: It’s not much of a tail, but I’m sort of attached to it.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Might take a day or two, but I’ll find a new one.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: No brain at all, some of them [people], only grey fluff that’s blown into their heads by mistake, and they don’t Think.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: No Give and Take. No Exchange of Thought. It gets you nowhere, particularly if the other person’s tail is only just in sight for the second half of the conversation.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: But I sure do like this new tail.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Nobody tells me. Nobody keeps me informed. I make it 17 days come Friday since anybody spoke to me.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: One can’t complain. I have my friends. Someone spoke to me only yesterday.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Sure is a cheerful color. Guess I’ll have to get used to it.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Thanks for noticin’ me.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: The nicest thing about the rain is that it always stops. Eventually.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: They’re funny things, Accidents. You never have them till you’re having them.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: We can’t all and some of us don’t. That’s all there is to it.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: Wish I could say yes, but I can’t.
data.author: Eeyore

data.quote: You don’t always want to be miserable on my birthday, do you?
data.author: Eeyore
